Reviews.Title: Extremely Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: RaShauna
Reviews.Content: We cannot view our cameras online or through a smart phone. This is the ONLY reason we bought the system. Customer Service is NOT AT ALL HELPFUL.

Reviews.Title: Svat equipment is junk
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: The cameras are junk. I had one's wire break while pulling it through the hole in the wall. I had another adjusting screw strip after one turn. I had to buy two more cameras to replace the junky ones Svat sells. I won't buy anything from them again.

Reviews.Title: for those of you who don't know this are a security camera package not a video or production set
Reviews.Author: Leonard Boucher
Reviews.Content: this was exactly what I was looking for, no problems shipped to my door, just as advertisedwork just like the rest of my system

Reviews.Title: day time color off dont buy
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Night vision is great but day time color is off on all 4 cameras.Green grass is a dull purple.Green rose bush is purple.My brown coat is also purple color standing next to a green door which shows up the right color.Other items color are off too.I had one Camera shutting off and on.Sent it back to Svat along with a usb drive with video showing color off.They replaced camera but said I had all cameras in wrong locations.I believe these are defected. I bought all these 11002 as a 4 pack.Took 2 of these cameras too a friends house and hooked up on north side and south side of home. Installed them on his security system.The color is off at his house also.I would bet Svat knows about problem but they are made in China at a factory that massed produced them and they have a warehouse full.They figure instead of scrapping them just sell.No profit money lost. I will try to get replacement camera up and report back on its color.

Reviews.Title: Very nice and reliable
Reviews.Author: J. F. Josaphat "Universal Mind"
Reviews.Content: I bought these cameras and my dog ate the power code and therefore killed the cameras. So I purchased the same to replace them and it turns out that they did not burn out. It seems that it would take a lot more than that to kill these cameras.

ProductInfo.Features:
24 IR LEDs For Up To 75-Feet Night Vision
480 TV Lines Resolution
Weather-Resistant Camera Housing
Anti-Vandal Mount
Easily Connects To DVR With 65-Feet Extension Cable
ProductInfo.Name: Svat 4 High-Resolution Outdoor Night Vision Security Cameras (11002)
